connector.description: Huawei Cloud component to integrate with SimpleNotification services

camel.sink.path.smnService.name: camel.sink.path.smnService
camel.sink.path.smnService.description: Name of SMN service to invoke

camel.sink.endpoint.authKey.name: camel.sink.endpoint.authKey
camel.sink.endpoint.authKey.description: Authentication key for the cloud user

camel.sink.endpoint.endpoint.name: camel.sink.endpoint.endpoint
camel.sink.endpoint.endpoint.description: Fully qualified smn service url. Carries higher precedence than region parameter based client initialization

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.region.name: camel.sink.endpoint.region
camel.sink.endpoint.region.description: SMN service region. This is lower precedence than endpoint based configuration

camel.sink.endpoint.secretKey.name: camel.sink.endpoint.secretKey
camel.sink.endpoint.secretKey.description: Secret key for the cloud user

camel.sink.endpoint.serviceKeys.name: camel.sink.endpoint.serviceKeys
camel.sink.endpoint.serviceKeys.description: Configuration object for cloud service authentication

camel.component.hwcloud-smn.lazyStartPro.name: camel.component.hwcloud-smn.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.hwcloud-smn.lazyStartPro.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.hwcloud-smn.autowiredEna.name: camel.component.hwcloud-smn.autowiredEnabled
camel.component.hwcloud-smn.autowiredEna.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.
